Sentencas: A modified liquid-solid-solution (LSS) phase transfer method has been applied to synthesize Gd2Zr2O7 binary oxide nanoparticles.
Titulo: Liquid-solid-solution synthesis of ultrafine Gd2Zr2O7 nanoparticles with yield enhancement

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction (XRD), Fourier transform infrared spectroscopy (FTIR), transmission electron microscopy (TEM), thermogravimetric analysis (TG) and differential scanning calorimetry (DSC) were employed to reveal the structural, morphological and energetic evolutions of both precursors and Gd2Zr2O7 nanoparticle products.
Titulo: Liquid-solid-solution synthesis of ultrafine Gd2Zr2O7 nanoparticles with yield enhancement

Sentencas: The Gd2Zr2O7 nanoparticles synthesized using this method exhibit an average crystallite size of 1.7 nm, which have great potential to be applied in thermal barrier coatings (TBCs), solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) and nuclear waste immobilizations.
Titulo: Liquid-solid-solution synthesis of ultrafine Gd2Zr2O7 nanoparticles with yield enhancement

Sentencas: Moreover, the method we developed in this study has a high Gd2Zr2O7 nanoparticle yield of up to 89%.
Titulo: Liquid-solid-solution synthesis of ultrafine Gd2Zr2O7 nanoparticles with yield enhancement
